names.pinyin: di yu er cang hu gao

actions: Drains Fire and relieves Fire toxicity for toxic sores and Damp-skin lesions.
With Huang Bai, for skin lesions due to Wind-Dampness.
Disperses Wind and dispels Dampness for skin disorders with itching.
Clears Toxic Heat, astringes fluids and generates flesh.
With Huang Bai, as a plaster for eczema and other Damp-Heat skin lesions.
Applied as a topical ointment, it stimulates hot and cold receptors on the skin without making the body cold.
Resolves toxicity, kills parasites, generates flesh and promotes the healing of sores.
Clears Heat, alleviates pain, dissipates nodules and alleviates itching.

notes: Grind to powder, combine with petroleum jelly, and apply to skin 2-3 times daily
